docs.title: Recon-all Log File
docs.description: Log file of the recon-all process

docs.title: Recon-all Status File
docs.description: Status file of the recon-all process

docs.title: recon-all
docs.description: Performs all, or any part of, the FreeSurfer cortical reconstruction process

docs.title: Subject ID
docs.description: Subject ID for the FreeSurfer analysis

docs.title: All flag
docs.description: Performs all stages of cortical reconstruction

docs.title: Autorecon all flag
docs.description: Same as -all

docs.title: Autorecon 1 flag
docs.description: Process stages 1-5

docs.title: Autorecon 2 flag
docs.description: Process stages 6-23

docs.title: Autorecon 2 CP flag
docs.description: Process stages 12-23

docs.title: Autorecon 2 WM flag
docs.description: Process stages 15-23

docs.title: Autorecon 2 Inflate 1 flag
docs.description: Process stages 6-18

docs.title: Autorecon 2 per hemisphere flag
docs.description: Tessellation, Smooth1, Inflate1, Qsphere, Fix, Smooth2, Inflate2, Finalsurf, Ribbon

docs.title: Autorecon 3 flag
docs.description: Process stages 24-34

docs.title: Hemisphere
docs.description: Specify hemisphere ('lh' or 'rh')

docs.title: Pons CRS
docs.description: Specify CRS for pons during fill operation

docs.title: Corpus Callosum CRS
docs.description: Specify CRS for corpus callosum during fill operation

docs.title: Left Hemisphere CRS
docs.description: Specify CRS for left hemisphere during fill operation

docs.title: Right Hemisphere CRS
docs.description: Specify CRS for right hemisphere during fill operation

docs.title: No Fill Flag
docs.description: Do not use automatic subcortical seg to fill

docs.title: Watershed Command
docs.description: Control skull stripping/watershed program

docs.title: External Brain Mask
docs.description: Custom external brain mask file

docs.title: WS Less Flag
docs.description: Decrease watershed threshold

docs.title: WS More Flag
docs.description: Increase watershed threshold

docs.title: WS Atlas Flag
docs.description: Use atlas when skull stripping

docs.title: No WS Atlas Flag
docs.description: Do not use atlas when skull stripping

docs.title: No WS GCA Atlas Flag
docs.description: Do not use GCA atlas when skull stripping

docs.title: WS Thresh
docs.description: Explicitly set watershed threshold

docs.title: WS Seed
docs.description: Identify an index (C, R, S) point in the skull

docs.title: Norm 3D Iters
docs.description: Number of 3D iterations for mri_normalize

docs.title: Norm Max Grad
docs.description: Max grad for mri_normalize

docs.title: Norm 1-B
docs.description: First usage of mri_normalize with control point intensity N below target

docs.title: Norm 2-B
docs.description: Second usage of mri_normalize with control point intensity N below target

docs.title: Norm 1-N
docs.description: First usage of mri_normalize, number of iterations

docs.title: Norm 2-N
docs.description: Second usage of mri_normalize, number of iterations

docs.title: Conform volumes flag
docs.description: Conform volumes to the min voxel size

docs.title: No Fix with GA flag
docs.description: Do not use genetic algorithm when fixing topology

docs.title: Fix Diag Only flag
docs.description: Topology fixer runs until ?h.defect_labels files are created

docs.title: Seg WLO
docs.description: Set WLO value for mri_segment and mris_make_surfaces

docs.title: Seg GHI
docs.description: Set GHI value for mri_segment and mris_make_surfaces

docs.title: No Thicken flag
docs.description: Pass '-thicken 0' to mri_segment

docs.title: No CA Align After flag
docs.description: Turn off '-align-after' with mri_ca_register

docs.title: No CA Align flag
docs.description: Turn off '-align' with mri_ca_label

docs.title: Deface flag
docs.description: Deface subject, written to orig_defaced.mgz

docs.title: Expert File
docs.description: Read-in expert options file

docs.title: XOPTS Use flag
docs.description: Use pre-existing expert options file

docs.title: XOPTS Clean flag
docs.description: Delete pre-existing expert options file

docs.title: XOPTS Overwrite flag
docs.description: Overwrite pre-existing expert options file

docs.title: Term Script File
docs.description: Run script before exiting

docs.title: MPRAGE flag
docs.description: Assume scan parameters are MGH MP-RAGE protocol

docs.title: WashU MPRAGE flag
docs.description: Assume scan parameters are Wash.U. MP-RAGE protocol

docs.title: Schwartzya 3T Atlas flag
docs.description: Use special young adult 3T atlas for tal reg

docs.title: Threads
docs.description: Set number of threads to use

docs.title: Wait for File
docs.description: Wait for file to appear before beginning

docs.title: Notify File
docs.description: Create this file after finishing

docs.title: Log File
docs.description: Specify log file

docs.title: Status File
docs.description: Specify status file

docs.title: No Append flag
docs.description: Start new log and status files instead of appending

docs.title: No Is Running flag
docs.description: Do not check whether this subject is currently being processed

docs.title: Hippocampal Subfields T1 flag
docs.description: Segmentation of hippocampal subfields using input T1 scan

docs.title: Hippocampal Subfields T2
docs.description: Segmentation using an additional scan and input T2 scan

docs.title: Hippocampal Subfields T1T2
docs.description: Segmentation using additional scan and input T1

docs.title: Brainstem Structures flag
docs.description: Segmentation of brainstem structures

docs.title: Subjects Directory
docs.description: Specify subjects directory

docs.title: Mail User
docs.description: Mail user when done

docs.title: UMASK
docs.description: Set unix file permission mask

docs.title: Group ID
docs.description: Check that current group is alpha group

docs.title: Only Versions flag
docs.description: Print version of each binary and exit

docs.title: Debug flag
docs.description: Print out lots of info

docs.title: Allow Core Dump flag
docs.description: Set coredump limit to unlimited

docs.title: Don’t Run flag
docs.description: Do everything but execute each command

docs.title: Version flag
docs.description: Print version of this script and exit

docs.title: Help flag
docs.description: Display help message and exit

docs.title: recon-all
docs.description: Performs all, or any part of, the FreeSurfer cortical reconstruction process
